Commands.Shock: Thunder magic BRV attack  High turn rate
Commands.Smoke: Self: 1 turn Evasion Up V; 2 turns Eblan's Teachings  Increases BRV based on ATK

Artifacts.Debuff Attack Up: Raises Attack by 5% while an enemy is debuffed
Artifacts.Break BRV Up: Raises Max BRV by 5% for 1 turn after breaking an enemy
Artifacts.Mighty Shock: Raises BRV Damage dealt with Shock by 10%
Artifacts.Bravery Smoke: Raises BRV by 10% of Initial BRV after using Smoke

Passives.Shock Power: Slightly raises BRV damage dealt with Shock.
Passives.Critical Power: Slightly raises BRV damage dealt with critical hits.
Passives.Shock Speed Up: Slightly raises Speed for 1 turn after using Shock.
Passives.Shock Charge: Increases the max uses of Shock by 1.
Passives.BRV Speed Up: Slightly raises Speed when BRV is over 50%.
Passives.Smoke Attack Up: Slightly raises Attack for 1 turn after using Smoke.
Passives.Avoid BRV Gain: Slightly raises BRV after avoiding an enemy attack.
Passives.Smoke BRV Gain: Gains a small amount of BRV after using Smoke.
Passives.Ninja's Secret Teachings: Slightly raises Speed for 1 turn when BRV equals 0.
Passives.Buffed Attack Boost Up: Moderately raises MAX BRV, ATK with active buffs
Passives.Shock Extension: Shock use count +2When using Shock:   Becomes 3-hit BRV attack; slightly increased cumulative BRV damage   Self: 4 turns MAX BRV Up II   Triggers additional HP attack after use
Passives.All Eblan's Teachings Attack: Slightly raises party's ATK while Eblan's Teachings active
Passives.Smoke Screen Extension: Smoke Screen use count +1When using Smoke Screen:   Slight boost to BRV increased based on ATK   Eblan's Teachings duration +2   BRV Attack becomes powerful BRV Attack+ while Eblan's Teachings activeAfter using Smoke Screen:   Triggers additional HP attack

Weapons.Ashura CP: 35: Increases Smoke's max uses by 1 and raises the BRV gain.Increases the potency of Eblan's Teachings ad extends its duration.Grants an AoE Provoke for 1 turn.
